Description: Bright and cheerful 3 bed, 2 bath single family home featuring gracious open concept living/dining room with large windows and plenty of sunlight. First floor also boasts a lovely eat-in kitchen, full bath, and bedroom. Second floor offers a large bedroom with double closet, full bath, and third bedroom. Finished basement perfect to use as office or family room. Desirably located on a cul de sac street ( Albert Rd), near walking path to Burr Elementary and dog park. Please email for all the inquiries.
